runs.comm: length ball around middle and leg, tried to be swung to leg, missed completely, a shout for lbw but maybe too high, maybe, but it looked close I thought, not out given
length outside off, a step to leg and a swing and a miss
length ball, lifted up and over the covers for a couple of bounces into the rope, had to delay the shot a little cause it didn't come onto the bat as he would have liked, gets four though

slapped straight to extra cover, Dilshan is slow to come through, in comes the throw, de Villiers take it on the run and dives at the stumps and gets there in time what a play from de Villiers! That was baseball style, taking the ball and getting back to break the stumps, super work
swing and a miss outside off stump
back of a length, guided past slip but a sliding stop from Botha at third man saves four
leg stump and full, flicked wide of deep square leg, they take two as the fielder comes around
off stump on a good length, it zips away and beats the batsman who was looking to play to leg and got totally done by pace and movement
movement away from the bat again, a flick off the back foot misses
full on middle stump, pushed into the covers
swing and miss outside off, another good length ball swinging away

leg stump and flicked straight to deep square leg, seemed to pick it up quite nicely but picked out the fielder with perfection, he didn't have to move a few yards in off the rope and took it hands inverted at shoulder height, a solid take
outside off hammered to deep cover, now South Africa have their sweepers in off these big boundaries so this is just one, whereas Sri Lanka allowed two every time out to the square boundaries
flicked into the deep, again just a single, same fielder now at deep square leg
length ball around leg stump, off the pad towards the off side, again just a single
swing and a miss just outside the off stump, there was a noise, obviously not bat
another good delivery, angled in and it's forced into the leg side
wild swing from outside off, up in the air and dropped by du Plessis going back from point, tough chance, he got there but couldn't hang on
leg stump, went to swing it away, comes off the pad and runs back to the bowler
step to leg, swung into the off side, bounces just in front of the sweeper coming in
full around off stump, hammered back to the bowler, fielded just about but they get a single
gives himself a little room and times a full ball off middle stump wide of long off, super shot, timing and placement ideal
slower ball, waited for and slugged down to long on on the back foot, they get two as long on moves to his left
step to leg, Botha follows him, dug out to deep midwicket
back of a length ball just outside off, smashed straight up in the air but spilled by Albie Morkel at midwicket, it went a long way up but should have been taken
fuller, worked to leg
short again, pulled again, bit of a top edge over short long leg down to the boundary on a couple of bounces
full just outside off, slapped to extra cover and they scramble a single
swing outside off, a thin edge through to the keeper was trying to go leg side, clearing the front leg to a full ball and it came off a top edge to chest height for de Villiers
outside off and a wild, wild swing gets a toe end to point
pushed well wide of off stump
back of a length, slapped to extra cover, no run

length ball and pulled to midwicket. Straight ball, tried to go over the leg side but it's takes some to clear these big boundaries, didn't catch it correctly and it landed directly where the fielder had just been moved to on the leg side fence
back of a length, blocked in the crease, they scramble a run into the off side
bumper that looked leg side but was judged to have gone over leg stump
full outside off, lifted over mid on, nice strike
leg side heave, just a single as deep midwicket scrambles in well from the rope
starts with a leg side wide, not great that at all
length outside off, heaved towards the deep midwicket boundary, just a single again
cut straight to deep cover, back of a length ball slapped perfectly to the fielder as he gave himself a hint of room
toe-ended towards extra cover from just outside off, back of a length
cut to short third man and dropped as he tried to take it with two hands above his head jumping up, burst straight through the fingers
slower ball, back of a length on leg stump, helped down to long leg who goes to his left to field
pretty much an identical scenario down to ;long leg
